    • Method Detail

      • act

        public void act(Agent target)
         throws java.lang.Exception
        Attempts to move the target Agent to the (x, y) position found by evaluating the expressions. If the slot it attempts to move to is already full, it throws an exception. It would be good if we could find a way to allow the user to say what happens when a FullSlotException is thrown.
        Specified by:
        act in interface Behavable
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
